channel.title: Llm on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Llm on Arrans github.io

item.title: BerriAI/litellm
item.description: Python SDK, Proxy Server (LLM Gateway) to call 100+ LLM APIs in OpenAI format - [Bedrock, Azure, OpenAI, VertexAI, Cohere, Anthropic, Sagemaker, HuggingFace, Replicate, Groq]

item.title: Mintplex-Labs/anything-llm
item.description: The all-in-one Desktop & Docker AI application with built-in RAG, AI agents, No-code agent builder, MCP compatibility, and more.

item.title: sigoden/aichat
item.description: All-in-one LLM CLI tool featuring Shell Assistant, Chat-REPL, RAG, AI Tools & Agents, with access to OpenAI, Claude, Gemini, Ollama, Groq, and more.

item.title: mendableai/firecrawl
item.description: 🔥 Turn entire websites into LLM-ready markdown or structured data. Scrape, crawl and extract with a single API.

item.title: infiniflow/ragflow
item.description: RAGFlow is an open-source RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) engine based on deep document understanding.

item.title: langchain-ai/langchain
item.description: 🦜🔗 Build context-aware reasoning applications 🦜🔗

item.title: ollama/ollama
item.description: Get up and running with OpenAI gpt-oss, DeepSeek-R1, Gemma 3 and other models.

item.title: vllm-project/vllm
item.description: A high-throughput and memory-efficient inference and serving engine for LLMs

item.title: continuedev/continue
item.description: ⏩ Ship faster with Continuous AI. Build and run custom agents across your IDE, terminal, and CI

item.title: All-Hands-AI/OpenHands
item.description: 🙌 OpenHands: Code Less, Make More

item.title: open-webui/open-webui
item.description: User-friendly AI Interface (Supports Ollama, OpenAI API, …)

item.title: khoj-ai/khoj
item.description: Your AI second brain. Self-hostable. Get answers from the web or your docs. Build custom agents, schedule automations, do deep research. Turn any online or local LLM into your personal, autonomous AI (gpt, claude, gemini, llama, qwen, mistral). Get started - free.

item.title: rasbt/LLMs-from-scratch
item.description: Implement a ChatGPT-like LLM in PyTorch from scratch, step by step

item.title: gitleaks/gitleaks
item.description: Find secrets with Gitleaks 🔑

item.title: pbek/QOwnNotes
item.description: QOwnNotes is a plain-text file notepad and todo-list manager with Markdown support and Nextcloud / ownCloud integration.

item.title: mlc-ai/web-llm
item.description: High-performance In-browser LLM Inference Engine

item.title: microsoft/semantic-kernel
item.description: Integrate cutting-edge LLM technology quickly and easily into your apps

item.title: SWE-agent/SWE-agent
item.description: SWE-agent takes a GitHub issue and tries to automatically fix it, using your LM of choice. It can also be employed for offensive cybersecurity or competitive coding challenges. [NeurIPS 2024]

item.title: steven2358/awesome-generative-ai
item.description: A curated list of modern Generative Artificial Intelligence projects and services

item.title: mudler/LocalAI
item.description: 🤖 The free, Open Source alternative to OpenAI, Claude and others. Self-hosted and local-first. Drop-in replacement for OpenAI, running on consumer-grade hardware. No GPU required. Runs gguf, transformers, diffusers and many more models architectures. Features: Generate Text, Audio, Video, Images, Voice Cloning, Distributed, P2P inference

item.title: 2noise/ChatTTS
item.description: A generative speech model for daily dialogue.

item.title: LostRuins/koboldcpp
item.description: Run GGUF models easily with a KoboldAI UI. One File. Zero Install.

item.title: run-llama/llama_index
item.description: LlamaIndex is the leading framework for building LLM-powered agents over your data.

item.title: microsoft/unilm
item.description: Large-scale Self-supervised Pre-training Across Tasks, Languages, and Modalities

item.title: eosphoros-ai/DB-GPT
item.description: AI Native Data App Development framework with AWEL(Agentic Workflow Expression Language) and Agents

item.title: getumbrel/llama-gpt
item.description: A self-hosted, offline, ChatGPT-like chatbot. Powered by Llama 2. 100% private, with no data leaving your device. New: Code Llama support!

item.title: basicmachines-co/basic-memory
item.description: AI conversations that actually remember. Never re-explain your project to Claude again. Local-first, integrates with Obsidian. Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/tyvKNccgqN

item.title: h2oai/h2o-llmstudio
item.description: H2O LLM Studio - a framework and no-code GUI for fine-tuning LLMs. Documentation: https://docs.h2o.ai/h2o-llmstudio/

item.title: Ebrizzzz/Youtube-playlist-to-formatted-text
item.description: A desktop application that extracts YouTube playlist transcripts and enhances them using Google’s Gemini AI models. The output is a book in any language you want.

item.title: zai-org/CogVideo
item.description: text and image to video generation: CogVideoX (2024) and CogVideo (ICLR 2023)

item.title: datvodinh/rag-chatbot
item.description: Chat with multiple PDFs locally

item.title: xyproto/algernon
item.description: Small self-contained pure-Go web server with Lua, Teal, Markdown, Ollama, HTTP/2, QUIC, Redis, SQLite and PostgreSQL support ++

item.title: yusufcanb/tlm
item.description: Local CLI Copilot, powered by Ollama. 💻🦙

item.title: louisgv/local.ai
item.description: 🎒 local.ai - Run AI locally on your PC!

item.title: rustformers/llm
item.description: [Unmaintained, see README] An ecosystem of Rust libraries for working with large language models

item.title: gotzmann/llama.go
item.description: llama.go is like llama.cpp in pure Golang!

item.title: microsoft/aici
item.description: AICI: Prompts as (Wasm) Programs

item.title: modfin/bellman
item.description: Golang lib for LLM APIs, ChatGPT, Gemini and Anthropic

item.title: fingerthief/minimal-chat
item.description: MinimalChat is a lightweight, open-source chat application that allows you to interact with various large language models.
